meanings.sent1: She paragraphed her essay to make it easier to read.
meanings.sent2: The student paragraphed the long passage for better comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The teacher accidentally paragraphed the instructions in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were neatly paragraphed, like a well-organized book.
meanings.sent5: He paragraphed his speech to emphasize each key point clearly.

meanings.definition: To write or organize into paragraphs.
meanings.sent1: He carefully paragraphed his notes for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The author paragraphed the story to enhance its flow.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally paragraphed the document by walking on the keyboard.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were beautifully paragraphed, creating a seamless narrative.
meanings.sent5: The writer paragraphed the dialogue to distinguish between different characters.
